title: Walnut Canyon National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      HoursEntry to park trails ends one hour before the monument closes.November–June — 9:00 AM until 5:00 PM MSTJune–October — 8:00 AM until 5:00 PM MSTThe park entrance road, trails, and visitor center are open all year, except December 25.  NOTE: Most of Arizona does not observe Daylight Savings Time. We stay on Mountain Standard Time year-round.
